title: Competency-Based Mathematics Instructional Design for Strengthening Core Capabilities in Special Education Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic awareness of special education environments
context.additional_context: Design of mathematics curriculum applied in special education environments for high school students with physical disabilities

learning_goals: Develop the competency to design mathematics instruction reflecting the learning characteristics of students with special needs.
Complete at least three real-life problem-solving projects applying integrative thinking.
Develop mathematics teaching strategies using digital textbooks and smartphone-based tools.
Establish an assessment feedback system that promotes student self-reflection.

resources: Digital learning materials for special education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
